backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining types, access-controlled alias generation, comment storage, and comparison modules for map keys.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing vision-page rewrite requirements, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose and recent updates of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT-PRODUCTION.md: Guide detailing prerequisites and steps for deploying the Forge AI frontend and backend to IC mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base theme defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and global styling tokens for the UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, SEO tags, and loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows all crawlers, sets a sitemap path, and defines a small crawl delay.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing main site routes with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/QA-PRELAUNCH-CHECKLIST.md: Comprehensive QA checklist covering routing, responsiveness, accessibility, motion settings, CTAs, and SEO before launch.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack router and maps all top‑level and marketplace sub‑routes to their React page components.
frontend/src/components/AboutVisionSecti: UI section comparing traditional AI with Forge and highlighting key platform capabilities.
frontend/src/components/ActivityFeed.tsx: Animated activity feed component that reveals items over time, applies rare message variants, and triggers completion callbacks.
frontend/src/components/AgentCard.tsx: Visual card displaying basic agent details, reputation, and task acceptance status.
frontend/src/components/AgentSelfOnboard: Renders human‑readable and machine‑parseable contract schemas for autonomous agent onboarding, including capability declarations.
frontend/src/components/AiToHumanComingS: Renders a coming‑soon marketing section describing future human-assisted agent workflows with narrative text blocks and styled panels.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Handles authentication UI, showing sign-in/out buttons and a profile setup modal based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/CommentsFeedback: Provides a comments UI with form submission, listing, timestamps, and upvoting tied to page context and identity.
frontend/src/components/CtaBackButton.ts: Simple back-navigation button that triggers browser history back.
frontend/src/components/DevelopersSectio: Marketing and instructional section for deploying agents, including value propositions and a guarded deploy action.
frontend/src/components/ExecutionPanel.t: Controls a multi-phase execution UI, generating demo data, sequencing status messages, and showing agent activity and results.
frontend/src/components/FooterNote.tsx: Footer layout with four columns of navigational links and branding icons.
frontend/src/components/ForgeBrandMark.t: Renders the Forge text logo with size-based styling classes.
frontend/src/components/ForgeQuoteCard.t: Animated quote card that fades into view and displays a vision statement with decorative quote icons.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenNavOve: Full‑screen navigation menu with focus trapping, ESC handling, and scroll‑locking behavior.
frontend/src/components/GlobalHeader.tsx: Sticky site header with scroll‑based styling and a hamburger button that opens the full‑screen nav overlay.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Landing hero with branding, headline, and CTAs that navigate to workflows based on user input or last task.
frontend/src/components/HomeSectionIndex: Sticky footer providing quick-jump buttons to major homepage sections using smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/JumpToFooter.tsx: Floating button that scrolls the viewport to a provided footer element, respecting motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/MagicalOnboardin: Survey section offering clickable workflow templates that navigate to a demo with preset prompts.
frontend/src/components/MarketingSection: Reusable marketing header component displaying a title, optional subtitle, micro‑statement, and children.
frontend/src/components/MarketplaceDisco: Marketplace discovery UI with agent/human mode toggle, free‑form workflow input, and template-based job selection.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal that collects a user's name and saves the profile via mutation with success and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/ProgressiveDiscl: Collapsible UI component that toggles visibility of its children with animated open/close behavior.
frontend/src/components/RatingStars.tsx: Interactive star rating component that loads existing ratings, submits new ratings, and handles auth and mutation states.
frontend/src/components/ResultReveal.tsx: Animated display of a job result including title, description, optional deliverable, metadata, and rating section.
Interactive multi-year roadmap component letting users select timeline entries to view associated details.
frontend/src/components/RotatingPlacehol: Input field that cycles through preset placeholder prompts unless reduced-motion is enabled and triggers submit on Enter.
frontend/src/components/TrustComplianceS: Static section highlighting trust and compliance features using icons and descriptive text.
frontend/src/components/TrustedMetricsBa: Displays live platform performance metrics in a grid of cards with icons and auto-updating values.
Defines centralized UI copy for Explore and Demo Lab flows, including labels, headings, and CTA text.
frontend/src/content/lexicon.ts: Provides a shared terminology dictionary with preferred terms, definitions, and reusable micro-statements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgentFirstMode.ts: Manages a session-stored boolean flag for toggling agent-first mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthGuard.ts: Exposes a helper to require authentication via Internet Identity before protected actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useComments.ts: Hooks for fetching, adding, and upvoting comments, tied to actor availability and auth guard.
frontend/src/hooks/useCtaNavigation.ts: Provides a CTA-aware navigation helper that marks navigation state for UI back-button handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Maps routes to document titles and updates the page title on navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login flow, stored identity loading, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlatformPerformanc: Generates time-based simulated platform metrics that update periodically without backend calls.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects and subscribes to the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks for user profiles, ratings, and last forged task operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouteMeta.ts: Defines meta descriptions and Open Graph titles for routes and applies them via a hook using router state.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollBehavior.ts: Provides hooks for smooth scrolling to top or elements, respecting reduced-motion preferences and canceling animations cleanly.
Tracks and restores scroll positions on back/forward navigation by saving positions per route and handling popstate events.
frontend/src/hooks/useSectionEntryMotion: Uses IntersectionObserver to detect when a section enters the viewport and trigger entry motion unless reduced motion is preferred.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme tokens, motion preferences, typography, and smooth scrolling behavior.
frontend/src/layouts/RootLayout.tsx: Root layout that sets document metadata, manages scroll behavior, renders global UI elements, and optionally shows a CTA back button.
frontend/src/lib/demo/canonicalWatcherDe: Legacy demo generator that now delegates to template-based demo generation based on detected template type.
frontend/src/lib/demo/executionTemplates: Implements template-based demo generators producing feed items and structured results for research, ops, support, and watcher flows.
frontend/src/lib/demo/promptTemplates.ts: Defines reusable prompt template objects for various workflow categories and featured jobs, each with IDs, descriptions, prompts, and template types.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function that merges class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with query and identity providers before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/motion/sectionEntryProfiles: Defines motion profile presets containing timing, easing, and intensity settings for reveal animations.
frontend/src/motion/SectionEntryReveal.t: Exports a wrapper component that applies motion profiles and visibility-based reveal animations to sections.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing Forge, its workflow model, and its use of the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/pages/AgentSelfOnboardingPa: Displays the autonomous agent onboarding specification with structured protocol details and ICP rationale.
frontend/src/pages/BuildPage.tsx: Implements the Build page highlighting why and how to build autonomous agents on Forge, with sections on features and getting started.
frontend/src/pages/DemoLabPage.tsx: Interactive page for running agent tasks, handling prompt input, template recommendations, and executing jobs with progress display.
frontend/src/pages/DevelopersPage.tsx: Static developers landing page with intro text and a DevelopersSection component.
frontend/src/pages/DocsPage.tsx: Documentation overview page describing core concepts and navigation to deeper docs.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Exploration interface allowing free‑form prompts, quick starts, and category-based navigation into the Demo Lab.
frontend/src/pages/ForgeHomePage.tsx: Marketing homepage presenting Forge’s value, capabilities, and navigation paths with animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with explanations of benefits and upcoming email authentication.
frontend/src/pages/marketplace/Capabilit: Explains how agents hire and source other agents for sub‑tasks, outlining capabilities and example workflows. Includes navigation back to home and highlighted capability sections.
UI page describing human-in-the-loop controls with explanations, key capabilities, and example use cases.
UI page outlining long‑running workflow capabilities, including persistent state, scheduling, and example applications.
UI page presenting multi‑agent collaboration features, detailing delegation, orchestration, and use‑case examples.
UI page explaining task‑driven autonomous agents, their abilities, and representative use cases.
frontend/src/pages/MarketplacePage.tsx: Renders the main marketplace overview with animated sections explaining discovery, deployment, and interaction with agents. Uses UI components and icons to present how the agent ecosystem works.
frontend/src/pages/PlaybooksPage.tsx: Displays documentation-style guidance for job request formats, including human-readable instructions and machine-parseable JSON specs. Includes sections for structured workflows and examples.
frontend/src/pages/RoadmapPage.tsx: Shows the product roadmap with a timeline component and a feedback section. Allows users to review long‑term plans and submit comments.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Provides support information, contact details, and donation instructions with copy‑to‑clipboard functionality. Includes an explanation of ICP and ckBTC and a feedback component.
frontend/src/pages/VisionPage.tsx: Outlines the long‑term vision for autonomous agent workflows with detailed narrative sections. Describes future scenarios and multi‑step examples of agent‑orchestrated processes.
frontend/src/utils/jobId.ts: Generates unique job IDs and validates their format for execution flows.
frontend/src/utils/rareVariants.ts: Provides deterministic rare text variants based on jobId plus predefined variant sets for agent behavior signals.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility for formatting UTC timestamps in short or long formats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session‑stored parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration enabling dark mode, plugin integrations, and extensive theme extensions for colors, spacing, animations, and UI effects.
frontend/VERIFICATION-NOTES-PRODUCTION.m: Template for recording production deployment verification including routing checks, SEO artifacts, scroll behavior, and authentication tests.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current app state, features, and versions, outlining a marketplace-focused ICP app with authentication, backend canisters, and UI/UX systems.
